backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing three gallery‑related features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including layout, sections, config, and deployment docs.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and steps for verifying static assets and deploying to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode values, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, OG tags, favicon links, and Google Fonts setup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing the site layout and all major sections in order.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with logo, quick links, and contact info including maps and directions links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Fixed header with scroll‑aware styling, smooth‑scroll navigation, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutCa: Compact capabilities section showing four manufacturing strengths using cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Benefits grid highlighting four product advantages with icons and brief descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Collect: Renders a collections grid with images, descriptions, and feature tags for various carpet types.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays a contact section with phone, email, location cards, and call‑to‑action buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Implements an image gallery with category filtering, error handling, and modal image viewing.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Provides a hero banner with background image and buttons that scroll to gallery or contact sections.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Exports centralized contact details including phone, email, and location with map URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login, storage, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for color themes, typography, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme extensions, colors based on CSS variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, issues, and requirements for a simplified single‑page marketing site focused on a gallery-first layout.
